Multi-stage sampling. Settlements were selected to be included from those settlements in Békés and Nógrád county where there is Slovak language teaching in the local primary school(s). Out of the 31 selected settlements, there were 5 cities and 26 villages. There is a high number of persons living in villages (70%), this corresponds to the distribution of the self-confessed Slovak population by settlement type based on the data of the Slovak Minority Self-Governments in Hungary. Distribution by education (the rate of those with university degree is 14%, with high school diploma 28%) also pretty closely corresponds with the Hungarian distribution modofoed by settlement type.
